text: Goodou ma ga miami tagamiami deenei, hudee geina nia palaawaa ne hai gi nia ‘yeast’. Nia laangi e hidu, gei goodou e gai godou palaawaa ono ‘yeast’ ai, gadoo be di godou hagatanga i Egypt hagallebullebu. Di palaawaa deenei ga hagaingoo bolo di palaawaa o di hagaduadua. Geina di palaawaa deenei gi langahia goodou i di waalooloo godou mouli di godou lloomoi i Egypt, dela go di gowaa hagaduadua.
